articles.author: Brendan Quinn, Dana O'Neil, Brian Hamilton, CJ Moore, Eamonn Brennan
articles.title: How the Final Four teams found Norchad Omier, Alijah Martin and other top players - The Athletic
articles.description: There's no McDonald's All-Americans in this Final Four. That just means the stories of how the players got to campus are even better.
articles.content:
The Athletic has live coverage of UConn vs. Miami in the Final Four. 
HOUSTON Theres not a single former McDonalds All-American in this Final Four, nor is there a player who was a top-30 recruit out… [+19943 chars]

articles.author: Sumit Arora
articles.title: Indian-origin robotics engineer to head NASA’s newly-established Moon to Mars Programme - Adda247
articles.description: Amit Kshatriya, an Indian-American engineer with expertise in software and robotics, has been appointed as the inaugural head of NASA‘s newly-established Moon to Mars Programme. This programme has been created to establish a long-term presence on the Moon, wh…
